release.description: Min and max functions added for scalars
release.action: min and max functions have been added for scalars, for combinations of abs, rel, dimensionless, money, and float.
Copyright notice has been extended to 2016.

release.description: Abs and Rel for detailed versions removed
release.action: The following changes have been made: Time.Abs, Time.Rel --) Time, Duration (TimeUnit) Length.Abs, Length.Rel --) Position, Length (LengthUnit) Temperature.Abs, Temperature.Rel --) AbsoluteTemperature, Temperature (TemperatureUnit) Angle.Abs, Angle.Rel --) Direction, Angle (AngleUnit)

DJUNITS is no longer dependent on 'reflections'. Instead, the 'Unit' class now defines an array of standard units that exist in the package. This list is also used in the unit tests (it is public static final).
Added ZERO constants for double and float scalars, with the exception of Money scalars.
